SELECT * FROM TL_C_STUDENT_INTERN tcsi INNER JOIN TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE tcic ON tcsi.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = tcic.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK INNER JOIN TL_JIC_PROFESSOR_INFO tjpi ON tcic.professor_pk = tjpi.professor_pk INNER JOIN TL_C_COMPANY_INFO tcci ON tcic.company_pk = tcci.company_pk WHERE tcsi.student_pk = #{student_pk}
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/MM/dd') >= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_START_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/MM/dd') <= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_END_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd')

SELECT tcir.REPORT_CONTENT , tcir.CREATED_AT AS REPORT_DATE FROM TL_C_INTERN_REPORT tcir INNER JOIN TL_C_STUDENT_INTERN tcsi ON tcir.STUDENT_INTERN_PK = tcsi.STUDENT_INTERN_PK INNER JOIN TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi ON tcsi.STUDENT_PK = tjsi.STUDENT_PK INNER JOIN TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE tcic ON tcsi.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = tcic.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK WHERE tjsi.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk}
AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/MM/dd') >= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_START_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yy/MM/dd') <= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_END_DATE, 'yy/MM/dd') ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT tcic.internship_start_date AS internship_start_date, tcic.internship_end_date AS internship_end_date, tcsi.student_intern_pk AS student_intern_pk, tcct.timecard_year AS timecard_year, tcct.timecard_month AS timecard_month, tcct.timecard_date AS timecard_date, tcct.getin_hour AS getin_hour, tcct.getin_minute AS getin_minute, tcct.getoff_hour AS getoff_hour, tcct.getoff_minute AS getoff_minute, tctc.timecard_category_name AS attendance_status tcct.company_timecard_pk AS attendance_pk FROM TL_C_COMPANY_TIMECARD tcct INNER JOIN TL_C_STUDENT_INTERN tcsi ON tcct.STUDENT_INTERN_PK = tcsi.STUDENT_INTERN_PK INNER JOIN TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi ON tcsi.STUDENT_PK = tjsi.STUDENT_PK INNER JOIN TL_C_INTERNSHIP_COURSE tcic ON tcsi.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK = tcic.INTERNSHIP_COURSE_PK INNER JOIN TL_C_TIMECARD_CATEGORY tctc ON tcct.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK = tctc.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK WHERE tjsi.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk}
AND TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy/MM/dd') >= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_START_DATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy/MM/dd') <= TO_CHAR(tcic.INTERNSHIP_END_DATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd')
AND 1=1
AND tcct.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK = 1
AND tcct.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK = 2
AND tcct.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK = 3
AND tcct.TIMECARD_CATEGORY_PK = 4
ORDER BY attendance_pk DESC
